productBaseInfoV1.title: Godrej Interio Alpha Engineered Wood Free Standing Cabinet(Finish Color - Dark Walnut)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: The Alpha shoe cabinet is a state-of-the art creation that reflects modern style. Crafted with paper and PU lamination, this cabinet can store upto 18 pairs of your footwear. It consists of three pull down doors that tilt open to store and close to conceal. This function makes it a sturdy solution for storing your footwear. The draw at the top allows you to store all your shoe essentials while the 3 huge cabinets below ensure maximum storage of your footwear collection.

productBaseInfoV1.title: VAS Collection Home Solid Wood Coffee Table(Finish Color - Brown)
productBaseInfoV1.productDescription: Wooden carved foldable table Wooden carved foldable table with fine carving & brass inlay work. Fully handcrafted table can be used for keeping flower vases or other decor pieces. Also one can fold the table when not in use. Wooden carved foldable table is made from high quality sheesham wood with high finishing. Size- l x b x h-12" x 12" x 12" Inch

2) The tests conducted by the laboratory depends on the type of furniture sent for testing. The sellers select the products which are to be sent for testing to the NABL certified laboratory.

4) Tests are done on a sample product and individual products sold are not tested. The test results may not be indicative or representative of the quality or characteristics of the lot from which a test sample was taken or any similar or identical product. The responsibility to ensure that the products sold are similar to the test sample is of the respective seller.

5) Successful test results and the Durability Certified badge does not necessarily imply life as per the durability certified badge. Life of the product depends on the usage, handling, environment and other external factors.
